dsOverview.title: CLIMAP Climatic Boundary Conditions for 18,000 years before present

summary.p: Northern Hemisphere present and 18,000 years before present, sea surface temperature, elevation, vegetation, soil type, and glacial ice from the CLIMAP project. Coarse resolution boundary conditions for paleoclimate analyses.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: KSU/GEOLOGY > Department of Geology, Kent State University
